mapper.delete: delete from rss_subscribe where rssSubscribeId in (${ids})
mapper.select: select a.* from rss_subscribe a left join rss_type b on a.rssTypeId = b.rssTypeId left join rss c on a.rssId = c.rssId where b.userId = #{userId} b.parentString like '%;${rssTypeId};%' or b.rssTypeId = #{rssTypeId} order by c.updateTime desc limit #{startPage},#{page}
